| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | None                   |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                        |
| The Master Shifter:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is male.
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* lets you close unless attacked.
* hits creatures as a +4 weapon. |                        |

The Master Shifter was the [quest leader](/wiki/Quest_leader "Quest leader") for the defunct [Doppelganger quest](/wiki/Doppelganger_quest "Doppelganger quest").
html:
Master Shifter

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ Master Shifter
Difficulty 20
Attacks Weapon 2d4, weapon 2d4
@ Master Shifter
Difficulty 20
Attacks

Weapon 2d4, weapon 2d4

Speed 12
Base AC 0
Base MR 30
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

The Master Shifter:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • lets you close unless attacked.
  • hits creatures as a +4 weapon.

The Master Shifter was the quest leader for the defunct Doppelganger quest.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Master_Shifter&oldid=96583"
